#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int t,i,n,a,r,flag;
	
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		
		cin>>n;
		for(i=n;i>0;i--)
		{
			a=i;
			flag=1;
			while(a)
			{
				r=a%10;
				if(r!=1&&r!=3){flag=0;break;}
				a=a/10;
			}
			if(flag==1)break;
		}
		cout<<i<<endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
